review: I am very happy with this item. It was very easy to set up, took only a few minutes. The remote is very easy to get used to. I have watched some shows on hulu and Netflix without any problems. The shows load quickly. I mainly purchased it so I can watch The Mindy Project on hulu on my TV rather than my computer, but I have found it is great to watch a lot of things. My TV is about six years old, and this works perfect with it.
